Author: Birdie49
Text: That would be nice! I felt pretty good at my old number but a little extra energy certainly wouldn't be bad. I definitely have a few "starvation mode" symptoms... kinda hoping my period doesn't come back though.

Author: phenylammonium
Text: This might not help, but I increased my intake from >!1350 to 1800 !<last year and actually lost weight although the previous number was my maintenance. Purging had fucked up my body bigtime and I needed those extra calories to heal my digestive system. Some bits of your body won't heal properly unless you have good nutrition. Or they might take ages to heal. Like there's a lot of misconception around it, but starvation mode is *technically* real, it's just not what a lot of people think. People who restrict a lot get brittle hair / papery skin, and your body needs energy to fix that as well. You'll also have more energy and be unconsciously more physically active as you won't be as lethargic.
